0: 1 At "Or" (lit. Light) on the fourteenth one checks for Chametz (unleavened product) by the light of a candle.

2  Any place where Chametz is not brought into does not require checking.  And what about what was said about (checking) two rows in a cellar? (This is a case of) a place where Chametz is brought into.  Beit Shamai say the two upermost rows of the wine cellar (require checking).  Beit Hillel say the two outermost rows (require checking).
3  - Searching - That one should not transgress the negative commandment of seeing and finding hametz.
